name: Dr. Flower
description:
Dr. Flower please help! My plants are dying! How can I keep it alive?

Credits
  • MUSIC/SFX: https://twitter.com/DisOmikronCJ
  • ART/PROGRAMMING/WRITING: http://twitter.com/paigemarincak
Technical Stuff
  • ENGINE: GameMaker Studio 2
  • ART: Clip Paint Studio, Photoshop CS6
  • MUSIC: FL Studio 20 and Audacity
How to Play
  • Use your mouse to interact with elements on the screen
  • Investigate the problems with each plant in front of you and make a diagnosis
  • Try to keep as many plants as possible alive!
  • 3 strikes and you’re out
Other Notes
  • This is a bit of an educational game. All plants and their relevant information and issues are real and drawn accurately… hopefully.
  • Information comes from “The NEW House Plant Expert” by Dr. D.G. Hessayon.
  • Hope you enjoy healing some plants and learning about them.
